display_long_description:
# Spring into Action with STILT!

Play as Liam Fuzz, a space postmaster on a quest to reclaim stolen cargo on a vibrant alien planet. Armed with springy STILTs, bounce through 20 exciting levels in a colorful, quirky VR adventure!

[media]

# Breathtaking VR Platforming

Leap over cliffs, dodge traps, and explore dazzling landscapes. Use your reflexes and problem-solving skills to overcome icy peaks, fiery volcanoes, and treacherous terrains.

# Epic Power-Ups

[media]

Upgrade your STILTs to glide, blast fireballs, and tackle tougher challenges. Every power-up brings new ways to dominate the levels with style.

# Multiplayer Chaos

[media]

Compete with friends in high-energy arenas! Battle it out in modes like Smack-em-all! and Balloon Hunt to see who’s the ultimate stilt master.

# Get Ready to STILT!

Reclaim your cargo, outsmart a mischievous octopus, and bounce into an unforgettable VR adventure.

# Join the STILT Community

[media]

Connect with players and stay updated on all things STILT: https://discord.gg/mYy9Z8axEm
